Text saved: **Feedback** is when someone tells you if you did something well or not well.

Managers want to give good **feedback**. They often say something good, then something bad, then something good again. This is like a sandwich.

But people get used to this. Then, they think the good **feedback** is not real. They think it is just to make the bad **feedback** easier. So, the good **feedback** is not helpful.

Good **feedback** should not just hide the bad things. It should help people do better work. It should make them want to do well.
Feedback received: Grade 3/10 - FAIL
